alert.note: Alert for Coastal McIntosh; Inland McIntosh; Long (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 25 at 6:25PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF MCINTOSH AND LONG COUNTIES... At 625 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Tibet, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph and up to nickel sized hail. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to plants, trees and crops is possible. Damage to windshields is unlikely. Some locations in the path of this storm include... Darien, Tibet, Townsend, Crescent, Carnigan, Eulonia, Pine Harbor, and Valona. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. You can also email your report to nws.charlestonsc@noaa.gov.
